amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in the Congressional Record to permit the Secretary to delay the drawdown if will worsen inflation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to permit the Secretary to delay the drawdown if will worsen inflation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nickel amendment (A077) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 222 (Roll no. 92).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A077) offered by Mr. Nickel.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nickel amendment (A077) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 222 (Roll no. 92).
